title: 18bit
extract: Definition of: PDP (1) (Plasma Display Panel) See plasma display. ... (3) (Programmed Data Processor) A minicomputer family from Digital that started with the 18-bit PDP-1 in 1959. Its USD $120,000 price was much less than the million dollar machines of the time and 50 units were built.
extract_html: Definition of: PDP (1) (Plasma Display Panel) See plasma display. ... (3) (Programmed Data Processor) A minicomputer family from Digital that started with the 18-bit PDP-1 in 1959. Its USD $120,000 price was much less than the million dollar machines of the time and 50 units were built.
